home_description: Embark on a magical journey where imagination meets artificial intelligence
home_nickname_minLength: Avatar name must be at least 2 characters
home_howToPlay_rule1: Minimum 3 storytellers to begin the adventure
home_howToPlay_rule2: The narrator chooses a card and weaves an association
home_howToPlay_rule3: Other players select cards that match the story
home_howToPlay_rule4: Everyone votes for the narrator's mysterious card
home_howToPlay_rule5: First to 20 points becomes the Master Storyteller!
